author: Simon Difford
description: This vintage aperitivo is lightly bitter and wonderfully complex with distinctive Ferro China, vermouth and Demerara rum favours.
name: The Haiti Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Ferro China Baliva quinine liqueur
10 ml Martini Rubino Riserva Speciale vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredient with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
